**About Me!**

My name is Brook, and I am a graduate student in the Masters of
Geomatics for Environmental Management (MGEM) program's class of 2025.
Originally from Ethiopia, Canada has been my home for the past seven
years. I am pursuing the MGEM to deepen my understanding of geomatics
concepts and tools, develop new technical and analytically skills, and
enhance my qualifications for a career in environmental and resource
management.

**Professional Experiences & Education**

-   Master of Geomatics for Environmental Management (MGEM) - University

-   Climate Adaptation Analyst Resilience - Climate Risk Institute,

-   Bachelor of Environmental Studies (Urban & Regional Environments)
